dcterms:creator: Ruining He
Julian McAuley
dcterms:description: This dataset is composed of product reviews from the Amazon website. The task is defined to predict whether a user will comment about a certain item.
dcterms:title: Amazon

dcterms:creator: Chong Chen
Min Zhang
Yiqun Liu
Shaoping Ma
dcterms:description: This is a sparse grocery shopping dataset released by ACM RecSys. It covers products from food, office supplies to furniture. The dataset consists of user transactions from November 2000 to February 2001. The task is to predict whether a user will buy a certain item.
dcterms:title: Ta Feng

dcterms:description: This is an industrial dataset of the real-world online cold-start recommendation feeds, collected from May to July, 2021. The dataset is extremely sparse as most users only have clicked a few items.
dcterms:title: Oncold
